text: This is going to be so much fun.

I can’t wait for all of us to
go the circus.
I heard there are going to be clowns, jugglers and magicians!
Hello Mary. Where is Johnny?
Oh, Hello Bob. Johnny was climbing a tree and hurt himself.
He says he can’t come and he asked to go the circus without him!
But it’s not fun without Johnny.
Bob do something!

Johnny can’t go to circus and that’s a fact
But let’s have some fun and do a surprise act!
Look! Johnny's window is open ,let's go in
Hey Johnny!
Johnny! Come to the garden.
We have a surprise for you!
Wow!
Bob. What is this?
Well, since you can’t go to the circus.
We thought we will bring the circus to you!
Presenting the goofy clown!
That was amazing!
And now we would like  to introduce to you the juggler
And now hold on to seats coz coming up next is the amazing magician!
What an unbelievable surprise this was!
Thank you so much guys.
It was even better than going to the real circus!
Thank you, Bob!
You are welcome Johnny.That’s what friends are for.
All for one...And one for all!
Come on everyone. Let’s sign on Johnny cast!
I have a better idea!

Hi kids, when you have friends it’s important to take care of
each other coz that’s what friends are for!

Hope you have a
great day filled with fun, laughter and learning!
See you soon!
